exm.mng: treasured object, treasure, darling, baby, cowry, good-for-nothing or queer character
pattra palm tree (loan from Sanskrit, Corypha umbraculifera), whose leaves were used as paper substitute for Buddhist sutras
Hulunbuir prefecture level city in Inner Mongolia
bass (loanword), bass guitar, Bes or Bisu, Egyptian protector god of households
shell, conch, cowry, mother of pearl, hard outer skin, also pr. [bei4 qiao4]
